name: Bored Pepe VIP Club
description: What is the project about? BPVC is a Coin named $BPVC and a collection of 10,000 Bored Pepe NFTs unique digital collectibles living on the Ethereum blockchain. Your Bored Pepe doubles as your Vip Club membership card, and grants access to members-only benefits, the first of which is access to PEPE LOUNGE, a collaborative graffiti board. Future areas and perks can be unlocked by the community through roadmap activation. What makes your project unique? Can be found on the following exchanges History of your project. Can be found on the following exchanges Whatâ€™s next for your project? Fair Distribution There are no bonding curves here. Buying a Bored Pepe costs 0.08 ETH. There are no price tiers; BPVC membership costs the same for everyone. Once the public sale has sold out you can get your Bored Pepe, on OpenSea. What can your token be used for?
